page.description: Perform some type of action on a video player control.

item.name: Action name
item.description: Specify the Video Player Control action you want to execute. Choices include.

item.name: Video player control id
item.description: Specify the video player control Id.

item.name: Method for specifying the video id to play
item.description: How should the video to play should be specified.

item.name: MP4 Video URL
item.description: Set the url to the MP4 video source. The MP4 format is suported by current versions of IE, Chrome and Safari.

item.name: WebM Video URL
item.description: Set the url to the WebM video source. The WebM format is suported by current versions of Chrome, Firefox and Opera.

item.name: OGG Video URL
item.description: Set the url to the Ogg video source. The Ogg format is suported by current versions of Chrome, Firefox and Opera.

item.name: Poster Image
item.description: Set the url to the video poster image. This will display in the player prior to the video loading.

item.name: Automatically Size The Video Player
item.description: When enabled, the video player will be automatically sized to fit to the max width and height of the panel card. A 16:9 aspect ratio will be maintained. On device orientation change, the player will be resized.

item.name: Use CSS For Responsive Video Player Sizing
item.description: When enabled, the video player will be automatically sized to the max width of the device using CSS which is fluid, responsive and fast. The onOrientationChange event is not used. A 16:9 aspect ratio is maintained. The height may overcome the available panel card height however the panel card may include scrolling.
